Cryptol.Compiler.Rust.NameMap

Description

Maps names to rust identifier, and avoids reusing identifier.

Synopsis

    • lUsed :: Set Ident
    • lMap :: Map a Ident
    }
  • emptyNameMap :: Ord a => NameMap a
  • addName :: (Ord a, RustIdent a) => (String -> String) -> a -> NameMap a -> (Ident, NameMap a)
  • removeName :: Ord a => a -> Ident -> NameMap a -> NameMap a
  • lookupName :: (PP a, Ord a) => a -> NameMap a -> Ident

Documentation

data NameMap a #

Associate names with Rust identifiers, and keeps track of which rust identifiers we've already used.

An empty mpa.

addName :: (Ord a, RustIdent a) => (String -> String) -> a -> NameMap a -> (Ident, NameMap a) #

Pick a Rust name for something, ensuring that it does not clash with any previously used names.

lookupName :: (PP a, Ord a) => a -> NameMap a -> Ident #

Lookup a name. Panics if not defined.
